data.name: Sciwork 2020
data.description:
Sciwork is a conference to share and discuss computer code for scientific,
numerical, and engineering work. We will focus on source code, and encourage
attendees to share open-source work for both scientific researches and
technical applications.

data.name: General
data.description: Conferences covering a wide range of web development and software engineering topics.

relatedRecords.description: FOSSCON INDIA 2019, Home,GIT, Belagavi, a platform to showcase your skills in all aspects of technology. The projects done using any of the open source software can be showcased. grab the chance to be a part of the wonderful event.
